channel.title: Open-Source Kiln Controllers
channel.description:
Julien Deantoni's kiln controller and smartphone app: [https://jdeantoni.github.io/KilnRegulator3.0/](https://jdeantoni.github.io/KilnRegulator3.0/) Designed to be compatible with Ceradel and Solargil kilns.
Zach Moore's [SmartKiln](https://github.com/ZachJMoore/smart-kiln-hardware) cloud based kiln controller.
Jason Bruce's fork of Apollo-NG's [picoReflow](https://apollo.open-resource.org/mission:resources:picoreflow): [https://github.com/jbruce12000/kiln-controller](https://github.com/jbruce12000/kiln-controller)
PiLN - Web-based Raspberry Pi Kiln Control Application. Various versions: * [pvarney](https://github.com/pvarney/PiLN) * [Blake Lewis](https://github.com/BlakeCLewis/PILN) * [Daylene Alford](https://github.com/fayena/PILN)
Arduino-based [kiln controller and data-logger](https://create.arduino.cc/projecthub/MrRoboto19/electric-kiln-controller-f5c633?ref=user&ref_id=477799&offset=0).
